en.title: My Products
en.now_desc: Write things down by sending messages. Organize your thoughts into conversations, collaborate with others, and sync across devices with iCloud.
en.today_desc: Today is an app focused on building good habits with a clean interface.
en.recordbox_desc: A multifunctional recording app for managing life's details: bookkeeping, moments, password manager, notes (Markdown), all in one box. Designed for simplicity, privacy, and efficiency.

zh.title: 我的产品
zh.now_desc: Now 可以把事情用发送消息的方式写下来。创建多个会话组织内容，与他人协作，通过 iCloud 同步到所有设备。
zh.today_desc: Today 是一款帮助用户建立良好习惯的应用，界面简洁直观，规划今日习惯。
zh.recordbox_desc: 多功能记录App，笔记(支持Markdown)、记账、记时光、密码备忘四大场景，极简设计蕴含强大功能。
